Core (artview.core)Â¶

ARTview is based in the abstract Component class and shared Variables.

Variable([value]) Class that holds a value, using change() emits a signal.
Component([name, parent, flags]) Abstract class for an ARTview component.
QtCore Qt backend to be used all over ARTview, now it is an alias to PyQt4.QtCore
QtGui Qt backend to be used all over ARTview, now it is an alias to PyQt4.QtGui
